info.name: Get rid of that blue shadow
info.description:
Some background styles forget to remove the blue shadow below the radar.
This is the coding to get rid of that obnoxious thing.
info.additionalInfo: (My background is <a href="http://userstyles.org/styles/51142/tumblr-damask-dashboard-theme">tumblr damask dashboard theme</url> by Larissa Punzalan)
